title: Iran village records Earth's highest heat index at 82.2° C
content: A heat index of 82.2°C and a dew point of 36.1°C potentially were recorded in southern Iran, possibly setting world records. US meteorologist Colin McCarthy reported these readings and expressed doubts about their accuracy, prompting calls for an investigation. These extreme conditions have raised health concerns due to high humidity and temperatures.
summary: A heat index of  82.2°C and a dew point of 36.1°C potentially were recorded in southern Iran, possibly setting world records. US meteorologist Colin McCarthy reported these readings and expressed doubts about their accuracy, prompting calls for an investigation. These extreme conditions have raised health concerns due to high humidity and temperatures.

title: Venezuela plunges into darkness: Nationwide blackout hits all 24 states, extreme heat drives people outdoors without power
content: Major power outage hits Venezuela’s capital, with Maduro government blaming ‘sabotage’
summary: Major power outage hits Venezuela’s capital, with Maduro government blaming ‘sabotage’

title: Russia says five killed, 46 injured in Ukraine strike on Belgorod
content: A late Friday attack by Ukraine on Belgorod, a southwestern city in Russia, resulted in five deaths and 46 injuries, including seven children hospitalized. Dashboard video captures the moment of the explosion. A criminal case has been opened. Ukraine has frequently targeted Belgorod since the Russia-Ukraine conflict began in February 2022.
summary: A late Friday attack by Ukraine on Belgorod, a southwestern city in Russia, resulted in five deaths and 46 injuries, including seven children hospitalized. Dashboard video captures the moment of the explosion. A criminal case has been opened. Ukraine has frequently targeted Belgorod since the Russia-Ukraine conflict began in February 2022.

title: PS5 purchase video goes viral: Salesman hugs overwhelmed customer, netizens react to celebration
content: A video has gone viral of a man's deeply emotional reaction upon purchasing a PlayStation 5. The customer's joy overflows after completing the transaction, leading to a celebratory hug with the salesman. The touching scene has garnered admiration worldwide, with many praising the emotional moment and the salesman's supportive gesture.
summary: A video has gone viral of a man's deeply emotional reaction upon purchasing a PlayStation 5. The customer's joy overflows after completing the transaction, leading to a celebratory hug with the salesman. The touching scene has garnered admiration worldwide, with many praising the emotional moment and the salesman's supportive gesture.

title: Russian helicopter with 22 on board goes missing in Kamchatka Peninsula
content: A Russian Mi-8T helicopter, with 22 on board including 19 passengers, went missing in the Kamchatka Peninsula. Departing from a base near the Vachkazhets volcano, the helicopter failed to make contact at the scheduled time. Russia’s Federal Air Transport Agency has initiated a search operation to locate the missing aircraft.
summary: A Russian Mi-8T helicopter, with 22 on board including 19 passengers, went missing in the Kamchatka Peninsula. Departing from a base near the Vachkazhets volcano, the helicopter failed to make contact at the scheduled time. Russia’s Federal Air Transport Agency has initiated a search operation to locate the missing aircraft.

title: Japan’s bold move to 4-day workweek: Will it end the ‘work yourself to death’ culture?
content: Japan is shifting towards a four-day workweek to combat labor shortages and overwork. Despite government initiatives promoting flexibility and work-life balance, only a small fraction of companies have adopted it. Some firms and employees report success, though critics worry about potentially longer hours and decreased pay. Engagement remains a key concern.
summary: Japan is shifting towards a four-day workweek to combat labor shortages and overwork. Despite government initiatives promoting flexibility and work-life balance, only a small fraction of companies have adopted it. Some firms and employees report success, though critics worry about potentially longer hours and decreased pay. Engagement remains a key concern.

title: JD Vance’s haircut is making waves — and not in a good way!
content: Republican Vice Presidential nominee JD Vance’s new haircut has unexpectedly captured social media interest. Amid a campaign visit to Philadelphia, Vance addressed a past controversial remark but found his hairstyle to be the main talking point. His visit also coincided with a rally by Vice President Kamala Harris as the 2024 presidential race heats up.
summary: Republican Vice Presidential nominee JD Vance’s new haircut has unexpectedly captured social media interest. Amid a campaign visit to Philadelphia, Vance addressed a past controversial remark but found his hairstyle to be the main talking point. His visit also coincided with a rally by Vice President Kamala Harris as the 2024 presidential race heats up.

title: 'Don't need publicity': Donald Trump denies exploiting Arlington Cemetery's visit
content: Former President Donald Trump denied allegations of using his Arlington National Cemetery visit as a political stunt, saying grieving families requested photos during his campaign events in Pennsylvania and Michigan. The US army accused the campaign of turning it into a photo opportunity. Trump criticized President Joe Biden’s handling of the Afghanistan withdrawal for the soldiers’ deaths.
summary: Former President Donald Trump denied allegations of using his Arlington National Cemetery visit as a political stunt, saying grieving families requested photos during his campaign events in Pennsylvania and Michigan. The US army accused the campaign of turning it into a photo opportunity. Trump criticized President Joe Biden’s handling of the Afghanistan withdrawal for the soldiers’ deaths.

title: Indian-origin man arrested for alleged murder of Nepali student in Texas after 'Sugar Daddy' site tip
content: Bobby Singh Shah, an Indian-origin man, has been arrested for allegedly murdering 21-year-old Nepalese student Muna Pandey in Houston. Found with multiple gunshot wounds, including an execution-style shot, Pandey's murder has led investigators to Shah through surveillance footage. Authorities are investigating Shah's potential ties to 'Sugar Daddy' websites.
summary: Bobby Singh Shah, an Indian-origin man, has been arrested for allegedly murdering 21-year-old Nepalese student Muna Pandey in Houston. Found with multiple gunshot wounds, including an execution-style shot, Pandey's murder has led investigators to Shah through surveillance footage. Authorities are investigating Shah's potential ties to 'Sugar Daddy' websites.

title: Trump seeks extended timeline in election subversion case, clashes with special counsel Jack Smith
'You could almost hear the river crying ‘I am free’': Tribes celebrate as dams fall in US river, freeing salmon trapped for a century
content: Workers have dismantled the final dams on a key section of the Klamath River, letting salmon swim freely for the first time in a century. This forms part of the largest dam removal project in US history, aiming to restore natural river ecosystems and bolster salmon populations, which are crucial to Indigenous tribes and local wildlife.
summary: Workers have dismantled the final dams on a key section of the Klamath River, letting salmon swim freely for the first time in a century. This forms part of the largest dam removal project in US history, aiming to restore natural river ecosystems and bolster salmon populations, which are crucial to Indigenous tribes and local wildlife.

title: 'One of the craziest CT scans': Doctor shares pictures of patient’s legs filled with parasites
content: An emergency room doctor from the University of Florida Health Jacksonville, Dr Sam Ghali, shared alarming CT scans showing a severe parasitic infection in a patient who ate undercooked pork. Diagnosed with cysticercosis, caused by the pork tapeworm, the patient faced significant health risks. Dr Ghali recommends avoiding raw or undercooked pork to prevent similar infections.
summary: An emergency room doctor from the University of Florida Health Jacksonville, Dr Sam Ghali, shared alarming CT scans showing a severe parasitic infection in a patient who ate undercooked pork. Diagnosed with cysticercosis, caused by the pork tapeworm, the patient faced significant health risks. Dr Ghali recommends avoiding raw or undercooked pork to prevent similar infections.

title: Miami Airport bizarre stunt goes viral: Man wrapped in plastic from head to toe tries to check-in as luggage — Watch video
content: A man wrapped in green plastic tried to check himself in as luggage at Miami International Airport, LATAM Airlines, creating a bizarre scene that amused but also disrupted travelers. The prank quickly went viral on social media, leading to varied reactions about the stunt's purpose and Miami airport's peculiar reputation.
summary: A man wrapped in green plastic tried to check himself in as luggage at Miami International Airport, LATAM Airlines, creating a bizarre scene that amused but also disrupted travelers. The prank quickly went viral on social media, leading to varied reactions about the stunt's purpose and Miami airport's peculiar reputation.

title: Chaos erupts at Trump rally: Man storms press gallery after former US president attacks media in Pennsylvania
content: During a rally in Johnstown, Pennsylvania, Donald Trump's critique of the media led to a dramatic incident as an unidentified man leaped into the press gallery. The man was subdued with a taser and removed by police. Another attendee was also handcuffed and escorted out, illustrating heightened tensions and chaos at Trump’s rallies.
summary: During a rally in Johnstown, Pennsylvania, Donald Trump's critique of the media led to a dramatic incident as an unidentified man leaped into the press gallery. The man was subdued with a taser and removed by police. Another attendee was also handcuffed and escorted out, illustrating heightened tensions and chaos at Trump’s rallies.

title: Trump ordered to halt aid to Pakistan due to ISI's 'undeniable complicity' with terrorists, US' ex-official reveals
content: HR McMaster's new book claims former President Trump halted aid to Pakistan over ISI's ties with terrorists. Despite orders, Mattis planned financial aid including armoured vehicles to Pakistan. McMaster stopped a shipment, but other aid persisted. Trump's decision, part of a South Asia strategy, caused controversy and criticism.
summary: HR McMaster's new book claims former President Trump halted aid to Pakistan over ISI's ties with terrorists. Despite orders, Mattis planned financial aid including armoured vehicles to Pakistan. McMaster stopped a shipment, but other aid persisted. Trump's decision, part of a South Asia strategy, caused controversy and criticism.

title: Wells Fargo employee death tragedy: How did body go unnoticed for 4 days of ignored odors?
content: Wells Fargo employee Denise Prudhomme was discovered dead at their Tempe office after four days. Prudhomme had last scanned into work on August 16. Her cubicle's isolation contributed to delayed discovery. No foul play is suspected, and the investigation continues. Wells Fargo pledges support for employees and thorough cleaning of the building.
summary: Wells Fargo employee Denise Prudhomme was discovered dead at their Tempe office after four days. Prudhomme had last scanned into work on August 16. Her cubicle's isolation contributed to delayed discovery. No foul play is suspected, and the investigation continues. Wells Fargo pledges support for employees and thorough cleaning of the building.

title: Prince Harry’s UK visit sparks rumours of reconciliation effort with King Charles III
content: Prince Harry flew to England for his uncle Robert Fellowes' funeral, possibly seeking reconciliation with his father, King Charles III. Despite both Harry and Prince William attending, they kept their distance. Tensions between Harry and his family heightened after King Charles' cancer diagnosis earlier this year. The royal rift continues to fuel public interest.
summary: Prince Harry flew to England for his uncle Robert Fellowes' funeral, possibly seeking reconciliation with his father, King Charles III. Despite both Harry and Prince William attending, they kept their distance. Tensions between Harry and his family heightened after King Charles' cancer diagnosis earlier this year. The royal rift continues to fuel public interest.

title: US dog breeder Paul Peavey’s murder: Suspect Sergio Ferrer arrested, puppies still missing
content: The death of renowned Colorado dog breeder Paul Peavey has taken a dark turn with the arrest of Sergio Ferrer, suspected of murder and robbery. Peavey was found dead on his property, and his home was looted, with valuable items and puppies missing. Authorities are focusing on the stolen puppies to solve the case.
summary: The death of renowned Colorado dog breeder Paul Peavey has taken a dark turn with the arrest of Sergio Ferrer, suspected of murder and robbery. Peavey was found dead on his property, and his home was looted, with valuable items and puppies missing. Authorities are focusing on the stolen puppies to solve the case.

title: 'We need to protect people': Zelenskyy fires air force commander after deadly F-16 crash
content: Following the crash of an F-16 warplane during Russian bombardment, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy dismissed air force commander Lt General Mykola Oleshchuk. US experts are investigating the incident that resulted in the pilot’s death. Lt General Anatolii Kryvonozhko was appointed as the acting air force commander, and Zelenskyy emphasized the need to protect personnel.
summary: Following the crash of an F-16 warplane during Russian bombardment, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy dismissed air force commander Lt General Mykola Oleshchuk. US experts are investigating the incident that resulted in the pilot’s death. Lt General Anatolii Kryvonozhko was appointed as the acting air force commander, and Zelenskyy emphasized the need to protect personnel.

title: Is US ready to accept the 2024 election outcome? Most Americans say yes, but poll shows Trump’s supporters have doubts
content: As the 2024 presidential election nears, a majority of Americans express readiness to accept the results, though divisions persist, especially regarding Trump. An ABC News/Ipsos poll shows that 81% are prepared to accept the outcome, but confidence in election accuracy and legitimacy varies significantly across political affiliations.
summary: As the 2024 presidential election nears, a majority of Americans express readiness to accept the results, though divisions persist, especially regarding Trump. An ABC News/Ipsos poll shows that 81% are prepared to accept the outcome, but confidence in election accuracy and legitimacy varies significantly across political affiliations.
